review: Really  like the voice search . But - if i want to search Netflix only no way to do that - Also Amazon needs to open the gates to Apps like drop box. there are a few apps that back up the setup data to drop-box. then when you instill the app on a new device you can just import the set up. Very handy feature. My 101 year old Father-in-law loved looking at family pic on the TV. that one feature was worth the price of the Fire-TV for his enjoyment. It's crazy having to manage family pic in multiply places.
